intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share and protect your information when using RiceCall.

sections.title: 1. Scope
sections.paragraph: This policy applies to the RiceCall website, apps and features (real-time voice, voice messages, notifications, support).

sections.title: 2. Data We Collect
items: Account data (display name, id, avatar, country/region, birthday if provided, contact email)
Usage data (sign-in/out, feature clicks, error logs, reports/support requests)
Device & connection (device/OS/browser, language, time zone, IP, ISP, approximate location)
Voice data (encrypted media streams; recordings/messages while retained; quality metrics)
Cookies & similar tech (session, preferences, analytics, protection)

sections.title: 3. How We Use Data
items: Provide, operate and improve voice/community features
Authentication, security and abuse prevention
Performance monitoring, debugging and analytics
User support and handling reports
Legal compliance

sections.title: 4. Sharing
items: Vendors/Processors (cloud, CDN, RTC, analytics, monitoring) under contracts
Legal requests
Business transactions
We do not sell personal data

sections.title: 5. Voice Data
items: Transport encryption for calls; no default storage
Recordings/messages stored while retained
Transcription requires opt-in and trusted processors
Quality metrics are aggregated/anonymous

sections.title: 6. Storage & Retention
items: Data centers in various countries/regions
Retention based on necessity and legal obligations

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
sections.paragraph: Depending on law, rights may include access, rectification, deletion, restriction/objection, portability, and consent withdrawal. Contact us; identity verification may be required.

sections.title: 8. Minors
sections.paragraph: If under the legal age, use with guardian consent and guidance.

sections.title: 9. Security
sections.paragraph: Industry-standard measures; no system is perfectly secure.

sections.title: 10. Third Parties
sections.paragraph: Third-party services are governed by their own policies.

sections.title: 11. Cross-Border
sections.paragraph: Appropriate safeguards such as SCCs where applicable.

sections.title: 12. Changes
sections.paragraph: We may update this policy; material changes will be notified.
